archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Picture Archiving System
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
Picture Archiving & Communication System (PACS)
• Purpose: Medical image storage, retrieval, and distribution system
• Core Functions:
o DICOM image storage and management o Image viewing and manipulation tools o Long-term archival and retrieval o Image distribution to referring physicians o Backup and disaster recovery
• Integration: RIS for workflow, EHR for image access, modalities for image acquisition • Standards: DICOM for image storage and communication, IHE profiles for integration • Architecture: Central storage, distributed viewing, cloud/hybrid options • Benefits: Filmless operation, improved image access, reduced storage costs
